Online Registration is live, Class of 2037! Families living in CASD with students who will turn five before September 1, 2023, can now register their students for Kindergarten next school year. Head to the CASD Kindergarten Registration page for more information: https://www.casdonline.org/Page/1860

El registro en línea está en vivo, ¡Clase de 2037! Las familias que viven en CASD con estudiantes que cumplirán cinco años antes del 1 de septiembre de 2023 ahora pueden inscribir a sus estudiantes para Kindergarten el próximo año escolar. Diríjase a la página de registro de jardín de infantes de CASD para obtener más información: https://www.casdonline.org/Page/1860

2024 PSSA

The English Language Arts Assessment for 3rd, 4th, and 5th grade will be April 22nd, 23rd, and 24th.

The Math Assessment for 3rd, 4th, and 5th grade will be April 29th and 30th.

The Science Assessment for 4th grade will be May 1st and 2nd.

The PSSA will begin each day at 9:30. Please make sure your students are well rested and arrive at school on time. Please encourage your students to eat breakfast and try their best!

Join our PTO!

Amigos de Stevens, Inc is a parent-teacher organization at Stevens Elementary School. Our mission is to enhance the student experience at Stevens by creating stronger connections between the school and the community, providing more opportunities for parent engagement, and increasing awareness of and advocating for policies to support students and their learning environment. Follow our page on Facebook for updates on meetings and ways to be involved.
